name: Double Gold: The Black Fountain and Sharpe's Deeds
description:
The Black Fountain and Sharpe's Deeds are two graphic text adventures that were only released as part of this compilation. Both use pictures to show surroundings while text describes it. The player types in commands to solve puzzles and complete tasks.

The Black Fountain story: You are a servant on the planet Areth to the High Chancellor. You have been given permission to leave to find your Brothers who are investigating a fountain of black water which is polluting the rivers made by the evil wizard Abholdos. The game is split into two parts. The first part you have to explore the court you serve in to collect objects you need for your mission. The second part you are in the big wide world and you need to find money and your brothers.

Sharpe's Deeds story: Your great Uncle Ferdinand Sharpe has died and has left the inheritance to you. You can collect the treasures if you manage to spend one night in the village of Stapley. You start in the local inn and must collect objects to solve puzzles and complete tasks.
